org.dejava.component.i18n.source.annotation

Annotation Type MessageSource


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
public @interface MessageSource
    Defines a source of messages (will be processed with the MessageSourceCreator annotation processor).

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String bundleBaseName
      Base name of the bundle that the class provides messages to.
      String[] processors
      Full qualified names of the processors classes (that must implement the MessageSourceEntryProcessor interface).

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String[] availableLocales
      Available locales that this source must provide messages to.
      String description
      Description for the message source file.
      String[] entriesAffix
      Strings to be appended to each entry added with the processors.
      boolean processSuperclasses
      If the super classes of the current class should also be processed.
      String sourcePath
      The source path where the source files should be created.

    • Element Detail

      • bundleBaseName

        public abstract String bundleBaseName
        Base name of the bundle that the class provides messages to.

      • processors

        public abstract String[] processors
        Full qualified names of the processors classes (that must implement the MessageSourceEntryProcessor interface). The initial idea was to return an array of MessageSourceEntryProcessor classes. But when resolving them at the annotation processor, a MirroredTypesException was raised. The work around was to set the classes qualified names instead and resolve them via reflection later (at the annotation processor).

      • sourcePath

        public abstract String sourcePath
        The source path where the source files should be created. "src/main/resources" is used by default.
        Default:
        "src/main/resources"

      • description

        public abstract String description
        Description for the message source file.
        Default:
        ""

      • availableLocales

        public abstract String[] availableLocales
        Available locales that this source must provide messages to. By default, "en_US" and "pt_BR" are used.
        Default:
        {"en_US", "pt_BR"}

      • entriesAffix

        public abstract String[] entriesAffix
        Strings to be appended to each entry added with the processors. By default, the entry is added without an affix.
        Default:
        ""

      • processSuperclasses

        public abstract boolean processSuperclasses
        If the super classes of the current class should also be processed. Default is false.
        Default:
        false
